attributes.action: Make it Law for all Public sector Agencies to comply and be certificated to ISO17799/27001 Information Security Standard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently it is optional for public agencies to be certified to ISO17799/27001 International Information Security Standard, to ensure practices and controls are in place to protect our information.  With the recent high profile breaches accross Gov agencies now is the time to make this mandatory by 2011.  Lets set the standard and enforce it.
